sentences.sentence: Here we're going to have more modest and bolder versions of the valuable container theory.
sentences.translation: 在这里，我们将会看到更保守和更大胆的有价容器理论。

sentences.sentence: While some of the budget airlines might use brighter, bolder shades, most others go with softened tones.
sentences.translation: 大多数航空公司选择柔和的色调，但一些廉价航空公司会采用大胆、明亮的色调。

sentences.sentence: They transform the aspirations of the people who live there; they nudge the self-image of the city into a bolder and more optimistic light.
sentences.translation: 它们改变了当地居民的愿望；它们将这座城市的自我形象推向了更大胆、更乐观的方向。
